data.text: @cholwekalaluka @KimKardashian Hopefully this will enlighten you and help you to understand the difference https://t.co/Z8TBY9FIAo

@cholwekalaluka @KimKardashian I should also add that in posting this image she has single handed undone so much of the work many groups have been doing for years to get people to understand how elephant riding is abuse!

@cholwekalaluka @KimKardashian There is no "charity" behind the place she visited just a man exploiting and abusing elephants for pure profit....why don't you do your research! The problem I have is the message this sends to people that elephant riding is ok when it is not!

@cholwekalaluka @KimKardashian Do some research on the cruelty behind elephant rides. Start by googling "elephant crush" and watch the videos to see how these babies are trained to allow humans to ride them, then you'll understand the anger at Kim
